jakarta.jms

Interface ConnectionMetaData


  • public interface ConnectionMetaData
    A ConnectionMetaData object provides information describing the Connection object.
    Since:
    JMS 1.0
    Version:
    Jakarta Messaging 2.0

    • Method Summary
